it seems like it's really great because

commercial real estate loans at banks in

this is according to Green Street

percent above the crazy peak of the

the index has dropped by 1.7 percent
including the one percent drop in March
from February it is now down 2.1 percent
from march last year and back where had
been in May 2016 now we've seen this
before
were the commercial property price index
was shooting up and then it leveled off

index dropped a steep two percent in
